casaAmbar.name: Casa Ámbar
casaAmbar.architectureInspires: Architecture that inspires. Design that embraces light.
casaAmbar.newHomeExclusive: Your new home in the most exclusive reserve.
casaAmbar.conceivedDescription: has been conceived from a contemporary design vision that stands out for its sober elegance and clean architectural lines.
casaAmbar.facadeDescription: Its facade combines noble materials, such as sintered stone and glass, with a contrasting chromatic palette and a modern composition that transmits exclusivity, balance and style.
casaAmbar.levelDescription: Each level has been conceived to provide spaciousness, comfort and connection with the outside, integrating natural light as a protagonist element. More than a house, it is a space designed to live with sophistication, privacy and harmony.
casaAmbar.architectureThatInspires: Architecture that inspires. Design that embraces light.
casaAmbar.yourNewHome: Your new home in the most exclusive reserve.
casaAmbar.schedulePersonalizedVisit: Schedule a personalized visit and discover why Casa Ámbar represents the future of residential luxury
casaAmbar.levelDistributionDesc: Each level has been carefully designed to offer a unique experience of comfort and elegance
casaAmbar.featuredCharacteristicsDesc: Every detail has been thought to create an exceptional living experience
casaAmbar.locatedInAmbar: Located in the Ambar subdivision within the Reserva Bosque Real Development, with 474 m² of construction + terrace on a 300 m² lot.
casaAmbar.naturalEnvironmentDesc: Surrounded by green areas and preserved nature
casaAmbar.connectivityDesc: Easy access to main communication routes
casaAmbar.developedByExperts: Developed by experts in luxury construction with more than 20 years of experience creating exceptional spaces.
casaAmbar.galleryComingSoon: Photo gallery and virtual tour coming soon
casaAmbar.nivel01Spaces: Studio 24m², Bathroom 5m², Living Room 22m², Dining Room 15m², Kitchen 26m², Service 9m², Pantry 5m²
casaAmbar.nivel02Spaces: Master Bedroom 25m², Bathroom 12m², Walking Closet 9m², Bedroom 1: 21m², Bathroom 4m², Walking Closet 4m², Bedroom 2: 21m², Bathroom 4m², Walking Closet 4m², Family Room 33m²
casaAmbar.nivel03Spaces: Terrace 64m², Gym 28m², Bathroom 4m², Wellness Lounge 10m², ½ Bathroom 4m², Laundry 8m²
casaAmbar.sotanoSpaces: Machine room 11m², Cistern 8m², Storage 13m², Wine Cellar 9m², Social area 23m²
nivel01Features: Exterior vestibule framed by gardens with texture landscaping and color matrices
Interior vestibule as conductor thread for spectacular double height
Living dining room crowning the space with double height
Avant-garde kitchen with Black Mirror and White Mirror quartz of timeless character
Contemporary design studio with built-in furniture and decorative details
Independent access and full bathroom that allows transforming it into private suite
nivel02Features: Spacious and illuminated Family Room as vestibule to the three bedrooms
Each bedroom has private bathroom, walking closet and individual terrace
Terraces that connect interiors with the area's landscape
Master bedroom with linear design bathroom
Large format porcelain and spectacular Milky Way granite accent
nivel03Features: Designed to enhance wellness and social life
Gym with southeast views, perfect for receiving morning light
Wellness lounge with direct access to private bathroom
Two independent terraces for social atmosphere and private corner
Can be adapted as additional suite according to lifestyle needs
sotanoFeatures: Tasting area and wine cellar creating the ideal atmosphere for delight
Storage zone with versatile space for general storage

cientoOchenta.name: One Eighty
cientoOchenta.description: One Eighty is an excellent option within the Bosque Real development, standing out for its elegant design and contemporary architecture. This development offers ample social areas, high quality finishes and a variety of amenities including gym, green areas, and more, ensuring a comfortable and modern living experience.
